Class SimpleRatingBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • com.viewlift.views.customviews.SimpleRatingBar
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback

    public class SimpleRatingBar
extends android.view.View
    A simple RatingBar for Android.
